Ivan Dolynskyi - Senior Full stack Developer

Summary

With a robust tenure of more than 14 years in the tech industry,I present myself as a seasoned Senior Full Stack Developer.
My career has been dedicated to devising scalable web applications that not only meet but exceed expectations.
I take pride in crafting clean, maintainable code and establishing reliable architecture that stands the test of time.
My expertise lies in transforming ideas into reality using cutting-edge technologies like JavaScript and TypeScript, along with contemporary web frameworks.
This skill set enables me to create software solutions that are not only quick and efficient but also user-friendly, ensuring a seamless experience for users.

PORTFOLIO

​Ceras Health is a pioneering digital health company based in Boston, Massachusetts, founded in 2011 by Anita Waxman.

Ekostay is a premier villa rental platform in India, offering a curated collection of luxury and affordable villas across popular destinations such as Goa, Lonavala, Karjat, Igatpuri, Bangalore, and Pondicherry.

Photino

​Photino is a China-based fashion brand specializing in the design, manufacturing, and wholesale of children's and women's apparel, as well as customized jewelry. Operated by Guangdong Photino Apparel Co., Ltd., established in 2014, the company is headquartered in Foshan, Guangdong.

HS Global Consultants (PVT) Ltd. is a leading overseas education consultancy based in Karachi, Pakistan, with a branch office in Australia. Established in 2016 by CEO Hanif Khan, an alumnus of Griffith University.

HakimHub

The website Hakim Hub appears to be a platform focused on connecting patients with qualified traditional medicine practitioners, often referred to as 'hakims'.

Bext

The Fintech that transforms, multiplies and facilitates your access to credit. I develop it by Vue.js for frontend, node.js for backend and postgreSQL for database.

Especialrentals

Especial Rentals is a global vacation rental and property management company offering a curated selection of luxury apartments, studios, and multi-bedroom homes across major cities including Paris, London, Dublin, New York, Istanbul, and various destinations in India and Europe.

Coriandershop

ShopCoriander.com is the online presence of Coriander Life & Style, a pair of sister boutiques located in downtown Collingwood, Ontario. Established in 1999 and proudly woman-run, Coriander has become a beloved destination for both locals and visitors seeking thoughtfully curated fashion and unique gifts.

Guardarian

​Guardarian is a fully licensed and regulated crypto-to-fiat gateway that facilitates seamless transactions between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies. The platform supports over 1,000 cryptocurrencies and more than 30 fiat currencies, catering to users in 170+ countries.
